summary: POWER STEERING LEAK. POWER STEERING FLUID IS LEAKING FROM WHERE THE HOSE AND INLET TUBE MEET. THE FLUID IS LEAKING DOWN INTO VARIOUS PARTS OF THE ENGINE. THE FLUID CONTINUES TO LEAK OUT AND RUN LOW, WHICH THEN NEEDS REPLACED. ISSUE IS A FIRE HAZARD, AND BURNING OF LEAKING FLUID CAN ROUTINELY BE SMELLED. A RECALL HAS ALREADY BE ISSUED B ACURA. MY VEHICLE CORRESPONDS WITH THE MODEL AND YEAR OF THE RECALL, HAS THE EXACT ISSUE OF THE RECALL, BUT IS NOT LISTED UNDER AS AN AFFECTED VEHICLE THROUGH A VIN SEARCH.
